type: Tutorial Step - Profile in a Heartbeat

definition.text: The Profile Constructor is the device you will use to set up your profile.

paragraphs.text: Not only that but it will create a unique Binance Smart Chain wallet that is connected with your profile. We call it your Governance Address.
This means that you will not be able to use any existing wallet addresses you may own, but will create a new one.

Your Governance Address will allow you to receive the SA tokens you earn. Superalgos will also read the balance of this address to become aware of the number of SA tokens you hold, and assign your profile an equivalent amount of Token Power.
